General.Name: Edisun Power Europe AG
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Edisun Power Europe AG, together with its subsidiaries, finances and operates photovoltaic systems in Europe. The company also sells solar energy to local electricity companies. It owned and operated 39 photovoltaic plants with an installed capacity of 107.1 megawatts in Switzerland, Germany, France, Italy, Portugal, and Spain. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.

0.Name: Mr. Horst H. Mahmoudi
0.Title: Exec. Chairman & Chairman of Exec. Board
